# Problem 1

Importing and cleaning the Mr. Trash Wheel sheet.
```{r}
trashwheel_df = 
  read_excel("./data/Trash-Wheel-Collection-Totals-8-6-19.xlsx",
    sheet = "Mr. Trash Wheel",
    range = "A2:N408"
  ) %>% 
  janitor::clean_names() %>% 
  drop_na(dumpster) %>% 
  mutate(across(sports_balls, round, 0))
```
